channel.description: Recent content in review on Just Random Notes

item.title: Questions I should review myself
item.description: Various questions and quotes that I collected and for myself to introspect and review later. Constantly updating. It’s NOT original – credits to all the original authors, even I don’t quote you here (being too lazy). What is your true north? What are you optimizing for? Why? Examine with Five Whys I want to ______[What] so that I can _______ [why] by _______[how] On setting goals What about this goal sparked my curiosity?
